name: THEMARUNGA
description:
Defend your planet against the purple comets using the platform to send them back home! (think Pong).

Find out what the star pickups do yourself (or don't, no pressure...)!

---

WASD - move "platform" (W+S only in the final level)

ARROWS - move "jumper"

N - toggle fullscreen

M - toggle mute

ESC - toggle pause
